A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched it in awe and fascination just as I had when I saw the original movie 40 years ago. It's visually breathtaking with a story that is easy to follow and keeps moving along. The only downside is that this is the \"middle\" movie in the trilogy so we have almost a two and a half year wait for the conclusion. Go see it\, ignore what all the hipster with hatred are posting.
